results.brief_description: Drama about a young man who dreams of living in a more tolerant society.

results.title: Dead easy
results.creator_credit: Bert Deling, John Weiley and Firebird Films
results.brief_description: Set in Sydney and supposedly based on actual events, a policeman, prostitute and a hustler become involved in gang war and find that life can be very dangerous. After they cross a small-time bookie they are hunted by every hoodlum in town.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bert Deling, John Weiley and Firebird Films

results.title: Dead calm
results.creator_credit: Phil Noyce, Doug Mitchell, George Miller, Terry Hayes, Kennedy Miller Productions and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: A psychothriller from the novel by Charles Williams about a married couple who have taken time out to recover from a family tragedy by spending time on their yacht at sea. This seemingly idyllic break soon turns into a nightmare when the couple rescue a young man from a drifting boat, unaware of the stranger’s violent and sociopathic personality that is about to set upon them. Stars Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman, Billy Zane. Cinematography by Dean Semler.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Phil Noyce, Doug Mitchell, George Miller, Terry Hayes, Kennedy Miller Productions and Warner Bros Pictures

results.title: Dawn
results.creator_credit: Ken Hannam, Joy Cavill and Aquataurus Film Productions
results.brief_description: Story of Australian swimmer Dawn Fraser. Dramatised biographical account of her life and times, and her acclaim as the first female athlete to win gold medals in three successive Olympic Games.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ken Hannam, Joy Cavill and Aquataurus Film Productions

results.title: A Dangerous life
results.creator_credit: R. Markowitz, Hal McElroy and McElroy & McElroy
results.brief_description: Tells the story of the four day revolution in the Philippines. Told through the eyes of a television reporter and photojournalist, it backgrounds the struggle that led to the 1986 revolution which saw Aquino become president succeeding the ousted Ferdinand Marcos.
results.creator_credit_for_label: R. Markowitz, Hal McElroy and McElroy & McElroy

results.title: Airhawk: star of the north
results.creator_credit: David Baker, Colin Eggleston, Ron McLean and Ron McLean Productions
results.brief_description: Jim Hawk, outback pilot and adventurer, is wanted by a group of international diamond dealers. When he starts investigating his brother’s murder, Hawk finds himself on the hit list. Conspiracy and murder follow him from Hong Kong to the Gold Coast and then to outback Queensland, as Hawk struggles to uncover the ringleaders and avenge his brother’s death. Based on the cartoon series created by John Dixon the film stars Eric Oldfield and Louise Howitt.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Baker, Colin Eggleston, Ron McLean and Ron McLean Productions

results.title: Squizzy Taylor
results.creator_credit: Kevin Dobson, Roger Le Mesurier and Roger Simpson
results.brief_description: Set in the 1920’s, in Melbourne, and covering the life and experiences of the enterprising and notorious criminal Squizzy Taylor. Stars Jackie Weaver, Alan Cassell and David Atkins.

results.title: Breakfast in Paris
results.brief_description: A high-powered female fashion executive meets a handsome, carefree photographer and their relationship starts with hot glares and cold shoulders. Things don’t get much better for him until the romance of Paris catches up with her. Filmed on location in Paris. Stars Barbara Parkins, Rod Mullinar and Jack Lenoir.

results.title: Sky Pirates
results.creator_credit: Colin Eggleston, John Lamond, Michael Hirsh and John Lamond Motion Pictures Production

results.title: Fatty Finn
results.creator_credit: Maurice Murphy, Brian Rosen, Australian Film Commission, Children's Film Corporation and Finn Films
results.brief_description: Film version of Australia’s comic strip, set in the years of the depression. Fatty is head of the neighbourhood nice guys and has a final confrontation with Bruiser Murphy and his gang of toughs. Stars Noni Hazlehurst and Bert Newton.
